Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add MarineSABRES Shiny App with Kumu-style CLD visualization

Complete Shiny application for Marine SES Analysis with:

## Features
- Interactive ISA data entry for DAPSI(W)R(M) framework
- CLD visualization with custom octagon shapes matching Kumu style
- Network analysis tools and feedback loop detection
- PIMS stakeholder engagement module
- Response options and scenario analysis
- Export functionality (Excel, CSV, JSON, RData, HTML, PNG, PDF)
- Comprehensive user guide and help system

## Kumu Style Implementation
- Custom octagon SVG for Drivers element
- Hexagon shape for Activities
- All 6 element types with correct colors and shapes
- Node labels positioned outside shapes
- Proper edge colors for positive/negative connections

## Technical Stack
- R Shiny framework
- visNetwork for interactive network visualization
- DT for data tables
- OpenXLSX for Excel export
- Modular architecture with separate modules
